mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.MEMBER_ID, O.RECIV_NAME, O.RECIV_ADDR, O.RECIV_PHONE, O.RECIV_REQ, O.DELIVERY_FEE, O.DELIVERY_ID, M.FILE_ROUTE, D.DETAIL_AMOUNT, D.DETAIL_OPTION, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, O.PRODUCT_ID FROM ORDERS O,MEDIA M,ORDER_DETAILS D,PRODUCTS P WHERE O.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND M.SUB_GROUP='대표이미지' AND O.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID AND O.PRODUCT_ID=P.PRODUCT_ID GROUP BY O.ORDER_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.MEMBER_ID, O.RECIV_NAME, O.RECIV_ADDR, O.RECIV_PHONE, O.RECIV_REQ, O.DELIVERY_FEE, O.DELIVERY_ID, M.FILE_ROUTE, D.DETAIL_AMOUNT, D.DETAIL_OPTION, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, O.PRODUCT_ID
